content.html:
Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

Flash Settings

11

1 Connect the unit to the camera.


MenuDescription
EF-X8Displayed when an optional EF-X8 flash unit is mounted on the hot shoe and raised.343
SYNC TERMINALAdjust settings for flash units connected via the sync terminal. SYNC TERMINAL is displayed if the EF-X8 is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe.345
SHOE MOUNT FLASHDisplayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on.346
COMMANDER (OPTICAL)Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on.349
2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the ↓ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options
available vary with the flash unit.

3 Highlight items using the selector
and rotate the rear command dial to
change the highlighted setting.


I.Q.MODE EF-X8
TTL±0 2.0" · per+2.0
AF MF红TL
MODE ATTL ZOOMADJUSTSYNC. ANGLE BACKFRONT END

4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.

342
content.markdown:
Peripherals
and
Optional
Accessories

# Flash Settings

11

# 1 Connect the unit to the camera.

| Menu | Description |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| EF-X8 | Displayed when an optional EF-X8 flash unit is mounted on the hot shoe and raised. | 343 |
| SYNC TERMINAL | Adjust settings for flash units connected via the sync terminal. SYNC TERMINAL is displayed if the EF-X8 is lowered and either no flash unit, or an incompatible flash unit, is mounted on the hot shoe. | 345 |
| SHOE MOUNT FLASH | Displayed when an optional flash unit other than the EF-X8 is mounted on the hot shoe and turned on. | 346 |
| COMMANDER (OPTICAL) | Displayed if an optional flash unit functioning as a com- mander for Fujifilm optical wireless remote flash control is connected and turned on. | 349 |


2 In shooting mode, select FLASH
FUNCTION SETTING in the ↓ (FLASH
SETTING) menu tab. The options
available vary with the flash unit.

![image](/image/placeholder)
IQ FLASH SETTING 
AF 
MF 
FLASH FUNCTION SETTING 
RED EYE REMOVAL 
↓ 
TTL-LOCK MODE 
LED LIGHT SETTING 
8 
COMMANDER SETTING 
2 
CH SETTING 
MY 
BACK EXIT 


3 Highlight items using the selector
and rotate the rear command dial to
change the highlighted setting.

| I.Q. | MODE EF-X8 | MODE EF-X8 | MODE EF-X8 | MODE EF-X8 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| I.Q. | TTL | ±0 2.0 | " · per | +2.0 |
| AF MF |  | 红TL |  |  |
| MODE A | TTL ZOOM | ADJUST | SYNC. ANGLE BACK | FRONT END |


4 Press DISP/BACK to put the changes into effect.

342
